message: I'll take 90% and you get 10% - it's a fair starting point, right?
Your offer was a bit one-sided. Let's be more reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.

I'm willing to accept a split similar to your previous offer, but I think it's only fair if I get the slightly larger share this time.
